name: Corn Man (demo)
description:
Play as Corn Man in this exciting new Triple A platformer open world fps dating sim side scroller rpg, where our hero, Corn Man, pledges to eradicate the invasive and unhealthy potato chips from his corn farms:

- Imersive grafics

- Collect coins that do absolutely nothing

- Play in 4 fantastic levels

- Play as Corn Man

Play as him.

Become Corn Man.

Don't resist.

🌽
